nodes.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
nodes.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 互联网不是万能的，您的手机浏览器也不应该是万能的。有了Insight，您可以在手机上轻松快速地创建扩展程序，我们会在您浏览时推荐最有用的扩展程序。只搜索您信任的来源；阻止广告、跟踪器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系统上使用无代码扩展进行超级搜索和浏览

localize.description: 互聯網不是萬能的，您的手機瀏覽器也不應該是萬能的。有了Insight，您可以在手機上輕鬆快速地創建擴展程序，我們會在您瀏覽時推薦最有用的擴展程序。只搜索您信任的來源；阻止廣告、跟蹤器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系統上使用無代碼擴展進行超級搜索和瀏覽

nodes.excerpt: Dual-pane file manager Commander One combines secure FTP client for Mac as well as cloud computing manager features and provides you with the built-in Mac Terminal emulator making it easy for you to manage all the system processes.
nodes.title: Commander One 3.0 - Dual-pane file manager and FTP client for Mac

localize.description: 双窗格文件管理器Commander One结合了Mac的安全FTP客户端以及云计算管理器功能，并为您提供内置的Mac Terminal模拟器，使您可以轻松管理所有系统进程。
localize.tagline: Mac的双窗格文件管理器和FTP客户端

localize.description: 雙窗格文件管理器Commander One結合了Mac的安全FTP客戶端以及雲計算管理器功能，併爲您提供內置的Mac Terminal模擬器，使您可以輕鬆管理所有系統進程。
localize.tagline: Mac的雙窗格文件管理器和FTP客戶端

nodes.excerpt: The Ultimate Guide to Analyze and Scale up Any Business Through Marketing Links. Inside you will also find specific guides for Instagram, offline tracking, LinkedIn, lead generation, UTM parameters, retargeting, deep link and affiliation marketing.

nodes.excerpt: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.

nodes.excerpt: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.
nodes.title: Uizard - The design tool for everyone, powered by AI
nodes.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 任何人都可以有伟大的想法，但不是每个人都是设计师! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能轻松设计交互式网络和移动应用。🛠快速原型设计、🧠头脑风暴和构思研讨会、✍️设计冲刺、👔推销客户等。
localize.tagline: 每个人的设计工具，由AI驱动

localize.description: 任何人都可以有偉大的想法，但不是每個人都是設計師! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能輕鬆設計交互式網絡和移動應用。🛠快速原型設計、🧠頭腦風暴和構思研討會、✍️設計衝刺、👔推銷客戶等。

nodes.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

nodes.excerpt: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team

nodes.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
nodes.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持无线充电的同时，还能为手机降温。它能在电池寿命和手机性能之间进行调整，使手机长时间运行在最佳状态。
localize.tagline: 保持手机凉爽，同时进行无线充电

localize.description: KooKit是一款突破性的MagSafe配件，在保持無線充電的同時，還能爲手機降溫。它能在電池壽命和手機性能之間進行調整，使手機長時間運行在最佳狀態。
localize.tagline: 保持手機涼爽，同時進行無線充電

nodes.excerpt: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
nodes.title: Hashnode Blog Cards - Replace your Hashnode Blog links with Blogs Cards.
nodes.author: Sourav Dey

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一组GET请求，它将通过少量参数从你的Hashnode ids中获取博客，并将创建SVG卡，为你的博客链接带来😎惊艳。🎉 Github 链接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 将您的Hashnode博客链接替换为博客卡。

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一組GET請求，它將通過少量參數從你的Hashnode ids中獲取博客，並將創建SVG卡，爲你的博客鏈接帶來😎驚豔。🎉 Github 鏈接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 將您的Hashnode博客鏈接替換爲博客卡。

nodes.excerpt: A Powerful Mac* App to... • zoom into pixels • measure angles & distances • sample colors and maintain palettes • check alignments • real-time color-blindness and color-contrast • take snapshots • real-time distances and bounding boxes..and much, much more.
nodes.title: QuickLens - Inspect the UI of apps, illustrations & websites like a PRO!
nodes.author: Pavan Podila

localize.description: 一款功能强大的Mac*应用程序，用于... - 缩放像素 - 测量角度和距离 - 采样颜色和维护调色板 - 检查对齐 - 实时色盲和色彩对比 - 拍摄快照 - 实时距离和边界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像专业人员一样检查应用程序、插图和网站的用户界面!

localize.tagline: 像專業人員一樣檢查應用程序、插圖和網站的用戶界面!

nodes.excerpt: Translate words straight from your Alfred launcher: - Open Alfred - Type a language combination and a word: `fren fromage` - Press enter to open the results page on WordReference! Get access to 48 dictionaries across 18 different languages!
nodes.title: WordReference for Alfred - Multilingual translations at your fingertips!
nodes.author: Alex Martin

localize.description: 直接从您的Alfred启动器翻译单词： - 打开Alfred - 输入语言组合和单词：`fren fromage` - 按回车键打开WordReference上的结果页面! 获得跨越18种不同语言的48种词典的访问权限!
localize.tagline: 多语种翻译触手可及!

localize.description: 直接從您的Alfred啓動器翻譯單詞： - 打開Alfred - 輸入語言組合和單詞：`fren fromage` - 按回車鍵打開WordReference上的結果頁面! 獲得跨越18種不同語言的48種詞典的訪問權限!
localize.tagline: 多語種翻譯觸手可及!

nodes.excerpt: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.

localize.description: 会议不会再有永远进行下去的感觉。Zoom Agenda可以让您创建一个议程，并为每个议程项目添加一个计时器，这样您就可以知道每个项目的讨论时间。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上为您的议程项目创建一个定时器。

localize.description: 创建美丽的小部件，并从主屏幕上打开播放列表、视频、文档、联系人、歌曲、微博和许多东西。
localize.tagline: 创建美丽的小部件和更多

localize.description: 創建美麗的小部件，並從主屏幕上打開播放列表、視頻、文檔、聯繫人、歌曲、微博和許多東西。
localize.tagline: 創建美麗的小部件和更多

nodes.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
nodes.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser
nodes.author: Kenneth Cassel 🐍

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.description: vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。Vim 爲您選擇的編輯器增加了代碼編輯的超級能力。今天就來快速學習vim吧！Vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。
localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。
